snippet.title: Falling with Ice Phoenix! | 下來啊！冰鳥-新感覺下樓梯遊戲 PV
snippet.description:
This game is a fast-paced, pixel-art platformer with action-packed gameplay, featuring anime-inspired characters and competitive elements. 
Falling with Ice Phoenix! combining the classic gravity fall platformer, sprited and high-octane action game, you and the cutie monster girls venture downwards to find the lost orb, facing traps and sexy monster lords ahead, an exciting adventure to the unknown lays ahead...

《下來啊！冰鳥》是一款融合經典下樓梯與像素風格的快節奏動作成人遊戲，你和失去魔力的美少女魔物女王一起結伴往下層探索，尋找失去的寶珠。面對陷阱密布的樓層、性感又不懷好意魔物領主們，一場充滿未知與挑戰的旅程開始了…

Steampage: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2685500/_/
(Game Release Date: 11/21)
X: https://twitter.com/icebirdfrovia
Discord: https://discord.gg/wkgTK9rHEW
Email: icebirefrovia@gmail.com
